name: Oh My Cooking Gun
description:
"Oh my Cooking Gun" is a virtual reality clay shooting game for all ages.
A magical cooking gun turns animals into food! Change the flying animals in a peaceful, quiet rural farm to food! It is a game that anyone can enjoy easily, fun and comfortably.
World ranking is provided. Renew your records, compete with your friends and boast!
You can play with Oculus lift.
